text:
Vivid Seats - Chicago, Contract-to-perm

Vivid Seats is a fast growing e-commerce site that serves the secondary event ticket market.

We're looking full-stack Java web developers of varying experience levels. Competence in SQL, JavaScript, HTML and CSS are all pluses.

Vivid Seats competes for the best talent -- we offer the perks, culture, and opportunity of an entrepreneurial start-up, supported by the scale, stability, and resources of over 10 years of profitable growth.

Apply here today: http://hire.jobvite.com/j/?cj=oT0HXfwh&s=Hacker_News
